# UICommandTagShare

**Global Variable**

A value that identifies a command as a Share menu.

## Declaration

```swift
let UICommandTagShare: String
```

## Discussion

To create a Share menu, add [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICommandTagShare] to the `propertyList` of a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICommand] or [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIKeyCommand] object.

```swift
// Ensure that the builder is modifying the menu bar system.
guard builder.system == UIMenuSystem.main else { return }

let shareCommand = UICommand(title: "Share",
                             action: #selector(share(_:)),
                             propertyList: UICommandTagShare)

let shareMenu = UIMenu(title: "", options: .displayInline, children: [shareCommand])

// Insert the menu into the File menu before the Close menu.
builder.insertSibling(shareMenu, beforeMenu: .close)
```

## Associating data

- **propertyList**: An object that contains data to associate with the command.
